settings.heading: "Evening Cravings" Is the #1 Most Frustrating Symptom for Men Trying to Lose Weight Over 30
settings.description:
You're eating healthy meals. You're staying active. You finish dinner feeling satisfied.
But two hours later, you're thinking about food again.

You tell yourself not to eat. You try to ignore it. But by 9 PM, you're standing in the kitchen eating things you didn't plan to eat. And to make it worse, you just want something quick so you grab the chips, cookies, pizza whatever it's fast and easy. You feel you are out of control, but…

It's not your fault.

After age 30, three chemical switches in your body get stuck in the wrong position. These switches control your stress levels, your calm chemicals, and the signals between your gut and your brain.
When these switches malfunction, your body sends fake hunger signals that feel 100% real.

That's why:

  • “Just don't eat” doesn't work → You're fighting a false alarm your body actually believes

  • “Eat earlier” doesn't work → The switches trigger at the same time regardless of when you ate

  • “Use willpower” doesn't work → Willpower can't override a chemical signal

You've tried keto. Intermittent fasting. Meal timing. Appetite suppressants. Nothing stuck because they only targeted ONE switch—or worse, they ignored the switches completely.

Here's what's actually broken:

settings.heading1: Your Stress Switch Won't Turn Off
settings.description:
Making your body think it needs emergency energy

All day, your body makes cortisol (your stress chemical). It's supposed to drop at night so you can relax.

But when you sit on the couch scrolling through your phone—reading news, comparing yourself to others, thinking about tomorrow's problems—your stress switch stays ON.
Your body thinks: "Still in danger. Still need fuel."
Even though you just ate.

settings.heading1: Your Calm Switch Keeps Shutting Off
settings.description:
Making your brain scream for quick-fix foods

Your brain uses serotonin (your calm chemical) to feel satisfied and content.
When serotonin drops too low, your brain panics and sends urgent emergency signals: "Need sugar NOW. Need carbs NOW. Need salt NOW."
This is why you crave cookies, chips, and ice cream—not chicken and broccoli. Your brain is desperately trying to boost serotonin back up with quick-fix foods.

Making false alarms feel 100% real

Your gut is supposed to send clear messages to your brain: "We're full. We're satisfied. All good."
But when the stress switch is stuck ON and the calm switch keeps shutting OFF, that communication line gets scrambled.
Instead of "we're good," your gut sends a loud emergency broadcast: "HUNGRY. NEED FOOD. EAT NOW."
Your brain hears this signal and responds exactly as it should—by making you walk to the kitchen.
The signal is fake. But it feels completely real.

You eat healthy meals (until the cravings attack). You stay active. You do everything "right."

But the switches stay stuck. The false signals keep firing. The cravings keep coming.

Energy drops. Weight not only stays on, but increases. You are left completely frustrated because you see yourself and what you see does not reflect your effort.

The solution isn't working harder—it's fixing what's actually broken.

By targeting all three switches with the right compounds at clinically effective doses, you can reset your body's signaling system to work with you instead of against you.

That's exactly what Dryft™ does.

settings.heading: Join Thousands Who Are Breaking the Loop & Eliminating Cravings For Good

settings.description: Every single night I'd tell myself 'not tonight.' And every night I'd end up standing in front of the fridge at 10 PM eating cold pizza or spoonfuls of peanut butter. The guilt was crushing. Three weeks on Dryft and I actually just... go to bed. No battle. No guilt. I feel like myself again.
settings.name: David K., 56

settings.description: 150,000 bottles sold
Sold out twice in 1 year
Over 40k men report feeling confident
Over 4,984 5-Star Reviews

The problem is, popular diets and supplements throw random ingredients at you, completely ignoring what’s going on inside. Worse, they use synthetic fillers and proprietary blends that hide weak doses.

Dryft™ works by targeting all three metabolic switches at once with clinically-effective doses.

Just 2 capsules a day reset:

settings.heading: The Calm Switch
settings.description:
L-Theanine + Ashwagandha (KSM-66) + Saffron

These three ingredients work together to turn your stress switch OFF. When cortisol drops naturally, your body stops sending "need food now" panic signals. 

L-Theanine stops stress without making you drowsy. Ashwagandha KSM-66 lowers your stress hormone by up to 32%. Saffron helps your brain make more calm chemicals.

settings.heading: The Energy Switch
settings.description:
GlucoVantage® Dihydroberberine

This ingredient flips your fat-burning switch ON. Instead of storing food as fat, your body turns it into energy. It also stops blood sugar crashes that trigger emergency cravings.

GlucoVantage activates brown fat tissue and helps you burn up to 100 extra calories per day—even at rest.

settings.heading: The Balance Switch
settings.description:
DIM + Boron + Zinc + B-3 Probiotic

These three ingredients work together to turn your stress switch OFF. When cortisol drops naturally, your body stops sending "need food now" panic signals. 

L-Theanine stops stress without making you drowsy. Ashwagandha KSM-66 lowers your stress hormone by up to 32%. Saffron helps your brain make more calm chemicals.
This focused 3-in-1 approach is why Dryft™ delivers lasting results when other solutions fail.

settings.heading: Saffron Extract (30 mg)
settings.label: ≥2% safranal, ≥3% crocin
settings.description: Think of this as your brain's "calm button." Saffron helps your brain make more serotonin (the chemical that makes you feel satisfied and happy). When serotonin is balanced, your brain stops screaming for cookies and chips. Clinical studies show people taking saffron had significantly fewer snacking episodes and better control around food.

settings.heading: L-Theanine (80 mg)
settings.description: The "calm without drowsy" ingredient from green tea. L-Theanine helps lower your stress hormone (cortisol) during evening hours—so your body actually knows it's time to relax instead of staying in "alert mode." This stops the false hunger signals before they start.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha Extract (300 mg)
settings.label: 5% withanolides
settings.description: One of the most studied stress-fighters on Earth. Ashwagandha helps lower cortisol by up to 32% and keeps your stress switch from staying stuck in the "ON" position all night. When stress drops, fake hunger signals stop firing.

settings.heading: Diindolylmethane (DIM)  (100 mg)
settings.description: Found in broccoli and cauliflower, DIM helps your body process hormones properly. Think of it like a filter that removes the "bad" forms of hormones and keeps the "good" ones. This helps maintain the metabolic balance your body needs to burn fat instead of store it.

settings.heading: Boron (as glycinate) (6 mg)
settings.description: A trace mineral that helps support healthy hormone levels and keeps your metabolism running smoothly. Boron works with DIM to maintain the hormonal environment needed for a lean, energetic body.

settings.heading: Zinc (as glycinate) (15 mg)
settings.description: Essential for over 300 processes in your body—including appetite control, mood regulation, and metabolism. Many people don't get enough zinc from food. This highly absorbable form makes sure your body has what it needs to function properly.

settings.heading: GlucoVantage® Dihydroberberine (100 mg)
settings.description: Think of it as your body’s switch—deciding to “store fat” or “burn energy.” Dihydroberberine keeps it on “burn,” is 5x more absorbable than regular berberine, and clinically shown to reduce waist circumference by 3.27 cm, lower blood sugar spikes, and support steady, lasting energy.

settings.heading: Grains of Paradise Extract (30 mg)
settings.label: 12.5% 6-paradol
settings.description: Contains special compounds that wake up your brown fat (the good fat that burns calories like a furnace). Think of it as turning up your body's thermostat. Clinical trials show significant increases in whole-body energy expenditure and visceral fat reduction.

settings.heading: Cayenne Pepper Powder (120 mg)
settings.label: 40,000 SHU
settings.description: Like turning up your internal furnace. The heat you feel when you eat spicy food? That's your body burning more calories. Research shows cayenne significantly boosts your calorie-burning engine and helps you burn fat even while resting.

settings.heading: Bifidobacterium breve B-3 (100 mg) 1×10⁹ CFU
settings.description: The gut-brain connector. B-3 helps restore clear communication between your digestive system and your brain. When this line is clear, your gut stops sending false "HUNGRY" alarms. Your brain can finally tell the difference between "I'm bored" and "I'm actually hungry."

settings.heading: Lactobacillus gasseri (50 mg) 200B CFU/g
settings.description: Picture a bouncer at your gut's door. This probiotic literally helps block some of the fat you eat from being stored. It's like a security system that won't let excess fat through. Clinical trials show significant belly fat reduction in just 12 weeks.

settings.heading: How is this different from other supplements I've tried?
settings.description: Most supplements only target one thing (like testosterone boosters or fat burners). Dryft™ targets all THREE metabolic switches at once. That's why it works when other solutions fail.

settings.heading: What studies support this product?
settings.description: Every ingredient is backed by clinical research. We use the same doses that worked in the studies—not weak amounts that don't do anything. You can find study links on our "Science" page.

settings.heading: What if my health markers are "normal"?
settings.description: That's exactly who this is for. Most of our customers have "normal" health markers but still feel frustrated because the three switches are stuck. We help reset the whole system, not just one marker.

settings.heading: What if it doesn't work for me?
settings.description: 90-day money-back guarantee. Try it for 3 full months. If you don't see improvements, we'll refund your purchase. No returns required. Zero risk.

settings.heading: Is it safe?
settings.description: All natural ingredients. No synthetic hormones. No stimulants. Made in an FDA-registered facility. However, always check with your doctor if you're on medications—especially for blood pressure or blood sugar.
